name: weblate
description: Weblate is a self-hosted continuous localization platform for translating software and websites. It integrates with Git, offers translation editors, and can also be used as a hosted service.
features: Translation management: Coordinate software and website translations across multiple languages in one platform.
Git integration: Sync directly with Git repositories to keep translations in version control alongside code.
Translation memory: Reuse previous translations automatically to maintain consistency and speed up work.
Machine translation: Leverage services like Google Translate, DeepL, or Microsoft Translator for initial drafts.
Quality checks: Automatically detect translation issues like missing placeholders, formatting errors, or inconsistencies.
Glossary support: Maintain terminology glossaries to ensure consistent translation of technical terms.
Collaborative workflow: Enable multiple translators to work simultaneously with conflict resolution and review processes.
Context information: Provide translators with screenshots, source code context, and comments for accurate translations.
API access: Automate translation workflows and integrate with CI/CD pipelines using the REST API.
Format support: Handle various file formats including PO, JSON, XLIFF, Android XML, iOS strings, and more.
Translation statistics: Track progress with detailed metrics showing completion rates per language and component.
Access control: Define translator roles and permissions to control who can translate or review specific projects.
